message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. My initial offer is $12000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. My counteroffer is $11750 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11200 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a mutually beneficial agreement, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11200. I'm willing to make another concession, though. My counteroffer is $11800 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11500 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11800 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a mutually beneficial agreement, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11800. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. My final counteroffer is $12500 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $12000 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider buying the product from John for $15000.
